title: Max Clifford
text:
Hello! I’m Max, a sophomore Student athlete at Macalester College studying Data Science, Spanish, and Portuguese. When I’m not busy playing football or hockey, I like to dabble in some data science! Check out my projects on the correspondingly named tab!


Macalester College | St. Paul MN 
B.A. in Data Science | Sept 2022 - In Progress


Email: mcliffo1@macalester.edu

title: Breakout Game
text:
For one of our Object Oriented Programming homework assignments, I created a version of the game breakout, with little to no given pseudocode/framework. Some ideas that I primarily focused on in this given assignment were Method and Class Decomposition.
Github Repo

objectID: Projects/Intro to Data Science Final Project/index.html
href: Projects/Intro to Data Science Final Project/index.html
title: Intro to Data Science Final Project - Ski Resorts
text:
A final project for Intro to Data Science - 
I worked with my two groupmates, Greg and Jude, with a kaggle dataset from skiresort.info.
Our focus was on finding the sole best ski resort for a family to visit.
Through this project we mostly applied the six main verbs of dplyr, (Mutate, Select, group_by, etc.), and used visualizations to tell a story.
Knitted RMD File (Download, then open)
Slideshow

objectID: Projects/Intro to Object Oriented Programming Final Project/index.html
href: Projects/Intro to Object Oriented Programming Final Project/index.html
title: Intro to OOP Final Project - Dad Joke Guessing Game
text:
For this object oriented final project, we used the icanhazdadjoke API (https://icanhazdadjoke.com/api)to make a dad joke guessing game.
Slideshow
Github Repo

objectID: Projects/Intro to Statistical Modeling Final Project/index.html
href: Projects/Intro to Statistical Modeling Final Project/index.html
title: Intro to Statistical Modeling Final Write-Up - Open Powerlifting
text:
For our final paper for Intro stats, we constructed a confidence interval and ran a hypothesis test along with our multiple linear regression, on a dataset from OpenPowerlifting.com.
Write-up
